Sentencas: The Yttria stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) is a standard electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), which are potential candidates for next generation portable and mobile power sources.
Titulo: Yttria and Ceria Doped Zirconia Thin Films Grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition

Sentencas: YSZ electrolyte thin films having a cubic single phase allow reducing the SOFC operating temperature without diminishing the electrochemical power density.
Titulo: Yttria and Ceria Doped Zirconia Thin Films Grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition

Sentencas: Films of 8 mol% Yttria stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and films with addition of 4 weight% Ceria (8YSZ + 4CeO(2)) were grown by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) technique using 8YSZ and 8YSZ + 4CeO(2) targets and a Nd-YAG laser (355 nm).
Titulo: Yttria and Ceria Doped Zirconia Thin Films Grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition

Sentencas: Films have been deposited on Soda-Calcia-Silica glass and Si(100) substrates at room temperature.
Titulo: Yttria and Ceria Doped Zirconia Thin Films Grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition

Sentencas: The morphology and structural characteristics of the samples have been studied by means of X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Yttria and Ceria Doped Zirconia Thin Films Grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition

Sentencas: Films of a cubic-YSZ single phase with thickness in the range of 1-3 mu m were grown on different substrates.
Titulo: Yttria and Ceria Doped Zirconia Thin Films Grown by Pulsed Laser Deposition
